answerText: Techion  Israel Institute of Technology[10] Another member of the Technion faculty was this really prolific Hungarian mathematician, who lends his name to a distance metric describing how many collaborators connect a given mathematician and him.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Editors 1 | 2 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Albert Einstein planted a palm tree at this university, where the Lempel‐Ziv compression algorithm was discovered. For 10 points each: [10] Name this institute of technology located in Haifa, Israel. Daniel Shechtman, the discoverer of quasicrystals, is also on its faculty.
